data.message:
Eminem sees the damage being caused by this dumbass in office, and  says, flat-out, you're either for or against.
He literally doesn't want or need  trump supporters in his fanbase. 
With absolutely great reason. If you support trump, fuck you.
Doesn't get much simpler than that.

replies.message: Really smh. You sound like a typical libTard!!!!!

And you seem like the typical dumbass who uses the word "libtard." 
Who's the actual "tard" here?

Also, Laura, i'm a "libtard" for reiterating what Eminem himself said? So.. Eminem is as well? 
You're insane.
It doesn't take a liberal to see how fucking evil Trumpf is, just takes half a brain.
The damage was done over the last 8 years... Now we are headed in the right direction...  TY PRESIDENT TRUMP.
You. Are such an idiot. You won't be saying that when you realize the shit he's doing affects you directly.. fucking half-wit.
